verses.text: Now it came to pass in the \w third|strong="H7969"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Hoshea|strong="H1954"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add that\add* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*.\f + \fr 18.1 \ft Hezekiah: he is called Ezekias\f*

\w Twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* was he when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*; and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. His \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* also \add was\add* \w Abi|strong="H0021"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zachariah|strong="H2148"\w*.\f + \fr 18.2 \ft Abi: also called, Abijah\f*

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, according to all that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w*.

¶ He \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, and \w brake|strong="H7665"\w* the \w images|strong="H4676"\w*, and cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* the \w groves|strong="H0842"\w*, and brake in \w pieces|strong="H3807"\w* the \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* that \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*: for unto those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* did burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* to it: and he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* it \w Nehushtan|strong="H5180"\w*.\f + \fr 18.4 \ft images: Heb. statues\f*\f + \fr 18.4 \ft Nehushtan: that is, A piece of brass\f*

He \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; so that \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him was none like him among all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, nor \add any\add* that were \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

For he \w clave|strong="H1692"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add and\add* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* him, but \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.  +  r 18.6  t from…: Heb. from after him *

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was with him; \add and\add* he \w prospered|strong="H7919"\w* whithersoever he went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*: and he \w rebelled|strong="H4775"\w* against the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* him not.

He \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \add even\add* unto \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, and the \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* thereof, from the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of the \w watchmen|strong="H5341"\w* to the \w fenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 18.8 \ft Gaza: Heb. Azzah\f*

¶ And it came to pass in the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, which \add was\add* the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Hoshea|strong="H1954"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add that\add* \w Shalmaneser|strong="H8022"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* it.

And at the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* they \w took|strong="H3920"\w* it: \add even\add* in the \w sixth|strong="H8337"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, that \add is\add* the \w ninth|strong="H8672"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Hoshea|strong="H1954"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* was \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* did carry \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5148"\w* them in \w Halah|strong="H2477"\w* and in \w Habor|strong="H2249"\w* \add by\add* the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Gozan|strong="H1470"\w*, and in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w*:

Because they \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* not the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, but \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \add and\add* all that \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, and would not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \add them\add*, nor \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add them\add*.

¶ Now in the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* did \w Sennacherib|strong="H5576"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against all the \w fenced|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w took|strong="H8610"\w* them.\f + \fr 18.13 \ft Sennacherib: Heb. Sanherib\f*

And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* to \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w offended|strong="H2398"\w*; \w return|strong="H7725"\w* from me: that which thou \w puttest|strong="H5414"\w* on me will I \w bear|strong="H5375"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* unto \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \add him\add* all the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* that was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and in the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

At that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* did \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* cut \w off|strong="H7112"\w* \add the gold from\add* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \add from\add* the \w pillars|strong="H0547"\w* which \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* had \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* it to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.\f + \fr 18.16 \ft it: Heb. them\f*

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Tartan|strong="H8661"\w* and \w Rabsaris|strong="H7249"\w* and \w Rab-shakeh|strong="H7262"\w* from \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w* to \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* with a \w great|strong="H3515"\w* \w host|strong="H2426"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And they went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And when they were come \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* by the \w conduit|strong="H8585"\w* of the \w upper|strong="H5945"\w* \w pool|strong="H1295"\w*, which \add is\add* in the \w highway|strong="H4546"\w* of the \w fuller’s|strong="H3526"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.\f + \fr 18.17 \ft great: Heb. heavy\f*

And when they had \w called|strong="H7121"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, there came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to them \w Eliakim|strong="H0471"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, which \add was\add* over the \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w Shebna|strong="H7644"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, and \w Joah|strong="H3098"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* the \w recorder|strong="H2142"\w*.\f + \fr 18.18 \ft scribe: or, secretary\f*

And \w Rab-shakeh|strong="H7262"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* ye now to \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, What \w confidence|strong="H0986"\w* \add is\add* this wherein thou \w trustest|strong="H0982"\w*?

Thou \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w*, (but \add they are but\add* \w vain|strong="H8193"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*,) \add I have\add* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* and \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* for the \w war|strong="H4421"\w*. Now on whom dost thou \w trust|strong="H0982"\w*, that thou \w rebellest|strong="H4775"\w* against me?\f + \fr 18.20 \ft sayest: or, talkest\f*\f + \fr 18.20 \ft vain…: Heb. word of the lips\f*\f + \fr 18.20 \ft I have…: or, but counsel and strength are for the war\f*

Now, behold, thou \w trustest|strong="H0982"\w* upon the \w staff|strong="H4938"\w* of this \w bruised|strong="H7533"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w*, \add even\add* upon \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, on which if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w lean|strong="H5564"\w*, it will \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into his \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*, and \w pierce|strong="H5344"\w* it: so \add is\add* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* unto all that \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* on him.\f + \fr 18.21 \ft trustest: Heb. trustest thee\f*

But if ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, We \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \add is\add* not that he, whose high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* and whose \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* hath taken \w away|strong="H5493"\w*, and hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, Ye shall \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* this \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*?

Now therefore, I pray thee, give \w pledges|strong="H6148"\w* to my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thee two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, if thou be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* on thy part to \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w riders|strong="H7392"\w* upon them.\f + \fr 18.23 \ft pledges: or, hostages\f*

How then wilt thou turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w captain|strong="H6346"\w* of the \w least|strong="H6996"\w* of my \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and put thy \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* on \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* for \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* and for \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*?

Am I now come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w without|strong="H1107"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* against this \w place|strong="H4725"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* it? The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to me, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* it.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Eliakim|strong="H0471"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, and \w Shebna|strong="H7644"\w*, and \w Joah|strong="H3098"\w*, unto \w Rab-shakeh|strong="H7262"\w*, \w Speak|strong="H1696"\w*, I pray thee, to thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* in the Syrian \w language|strong="H0762"\w*; for we \w understand|strong="H8085"\w* \add it:\add* and \w talk|strong="H1696"\w* not with us in the \w Jews’ language|strong="H3066"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add are\add* on the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.

But \w Rab-shakeh|strong="H7262"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Hath my \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me to thy \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, and to thee, to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*? \add hath he\add* not \add sent me\add* to the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* which \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* on the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, that they may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* their own \w dung|strong="H6675"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* their own \w piss|strong="H4325"\w* with you?\f + \fr 18.27 \ft their own piss: Heb. the water of their feet\f*

Then \w Rab-shakeh|strong="H7262"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* and \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* with a \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* in the \w Jews’ language|strong="H3066"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*:

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, Let not \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w deceive|strong="H5377"\w* you: for he shall not be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* you out of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*:

Neither let \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* make you \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w surely|strong="H5337"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* us, and this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall not be \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.

\w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* not to \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*: for thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, \w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \add an agreement\add* with me by a \w present|strong="H1293"\w*, and come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to me, and \add then\add* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* ye every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of his own \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, and every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of his fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* ye every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of his \w cistern|strong="H0953"\w*:\f + \fr 18.31 \ft Make…: or, Seek my favour: Heb. Make with me a blessing\f*\f + \fr 18.31 \ft cistern: or, pit\f*

Until I \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and take you \w away|strong="H3947"\w* to a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* like your own \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w corn|strong="H1715"\w* and \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w oil|strong="H3323"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* and of \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, that ye may \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, and not \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: and \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* not unto \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, when he \w persuadeth|strong="H5496"\w* you, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* us.\f + \fr 18.32 \ft persuadeth: or, deceiveth\f*

Hath \w any|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* at \w all|strong="H5337"\w* his \w land|strong="H0776"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*?

Where \add are\add* the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*, and of \w Arpad|strong="H0774"\w*? where \add are\add* the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Sepharvaim|strong="H5617"\w*, \w Hena|strong="H2012"\w*, and \w Ivah|strong="H5755"\w*? have they \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* out of mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?

Who \add are\add* they among all the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*, that have \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* their \w country|strong="H0776"\w* out of mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* should \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* out of mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?

But the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* held their \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*, and \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* him not a \w word|strong="H1697"\w*: for the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* was, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Answer|strong="H6030"\w* him not.

Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w Eliakim|strong="H0471"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, which \add was\add* over the \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w Shebna|strong="H7644"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, and \w Joah|strong="H3098"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* the \w recorder|strong="H2142"\w*, to \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* with \add their\add* \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w* \w rent|strong="H7167"\w*, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Rab-shakeh|strong="H7262"\w*.
